Uses of Interface
reuze.aa_i_CostFunctionStep

  • Packages that use aa_i_CostFunctionStep 
    Package Description
    reuze  

    • Uses of aa_i_CostFunctionStep in reuze

      Classes in reuze that implement aa_i_CostFunctionStep 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  aa_CostFunctionMapStep
      Implementation of StepCostFunction interface that uses the distance between locations to calculate the cost in addition to a constant cost, so that it may be used in conjunction with a Uniform-cost search.
      class  aa_CostFunctionStepDefault
      Returns one for every action.
      Methods in reuze that return aa_i_CostFunctionStep 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      aa_i_CostFunctionStep a_Problem.getStepCostFunction()
      Returns the path cost function.
      aa_i_CostFunctionStep aa_SearchProblemOnline.getStepCostFunction()
      Returns the step cost function of this online search problem.
      Constructors in reuze with parameters of type aa_i_CostFunctionStep 
      Constructor and Description
      a_Problem(java.lang.Object initialState, aa_i_ActionsFunction actionsFunction, aa_i_ActionResultFunction resultFunction, a_GoalTest goalTest, aa_i_CostFunctionStep stepCostFunction)
      Constructs a problem with the specified components, which includes a step cost function.
      aa_SearchProblemOnline(aa_i_ActionsFunction actionsFunction, a_GoalTest goalTest, aa_i_CostFunctionStep stepCostFunction)
      Constructs an online search problem with the specified action function, goal test, and a default step cost function.
